title: 51st: What Hamilton Got Wrong About D.C.
dc:creator: Mikaela Lefrak
description: A Philadelphia mutiny. A secret dinner meeting with three Founding Fathers. A controversial political boss's citywide reorganization plan. To understand Washingtonians' voting rights today, we dive into the city's past. This is the second episode of 51st, from WAMU's What's With Washington.
